title: #SerialInterface.v1_0_4.SerialInterface

enumDescriptions.Hardware: Out of band flow control imposed.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

InterfaceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this interface is enabled.
InterfaceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this interface is enabled.

SignalType.description: The type of signal used for the communication connection - RS232 or RS485.
SignalType.longDescription: This property shall indicate the type of serial signalling that will be utilized for the serial connection.

BitRate.description: The receive and transmit rate of data flow, typically in bits-per-second (bps), over the serial connection.
BitRate.longDescription: This property shall indicate the transmit and receive speed of the serial connection.

Parity.description: The type of parity used by the sender and receiver in order to detect errors over the serial connection.
Parity.longDescription: This property shall indicate parity information for a serial connection.

DataBits.description: The number of data bits that will follow the start bit over the serial connection.
DataBits.longDescription: This property shall indicate number of data bits for the serial connection.

StopBits.description: The period of time before the next start bit is transmitted.
StopBits.longDescription: This property shall indicate the stop bits for the serial connection.

FlowControl.description: The type of flow control, if any, that will be imposed on the serial connection.
FlowControl.longDescription: This property shall indicate the flow control mechanism for the serial connection.

ConnectorType.description: The type of connector used for this interface.
ConnectorType.longDescription: This property shall indicate the type of phyiscal connector used for this serial connection.

PinOut.description: The physical pin configuration needed for a serial connector.
PinOut.longDescription: This property shall indicate the physical pin out for the serial connection.

SerialInterface.description: This schema defines an asynchronous serial interface resource.
SerialInterface.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent serial resources as part of the Redfish specification.
